meanings.definition: A type of hardboard made of wood fibers and resin, used in construction.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used masonite to build a sturdy shelf.
meanings.sent2: The workers installed masonite panels on the walls of the new house.
meanings.sent3: When the masonite started talking, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a sheet of masonite.
meanings.sent5: The masonite's smooth surface made it perfect for painting.

meanings.definition: To cover or line with masonite.
meanings.sent1: They decided to masonite the entire floor for durability.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter will masonite the walls before painting them.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally masonited my shoes with paint instead of the walls!
meanings.sent4: Her words masonited his heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully masonited the canvas to create a sturdy base for the painting.
